title: The Secret Affair
description: Mills & Boon Desire series delivers powerful, passionate romances…It has been a year since Jillian Novak ended their affair — a year that left Dr Aidan Westmoreland determined to win back his lover. He knows they don’t have to keep their relationship a secret, but he has to follow her around the world to prove it. Fourteen days on a cruise ship — just Aidan, Jillian and the deep blue sea...and a passion that won’t be denied.
author: Brenda Jackson
